response:
"warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unsere personenbezogenen daten sammeln und verkaufen? gibt es keine gesetze, die uns vor diesem diebstahl schützen? #datenschutz #privatsphäre"

translation: "why are there still companies that collect and sell our personal data? are there no laws that protect us from this theft? #dataprivacy #privacy"

this post critically examines the issue of companies collecting and selling personal data without proper consent or regard for privacy. it questions the lack of effective laws and regulations to protect individuals' personal information and highlights the importance of data privacy and privacy in general. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy) and #privatsphäre (privacy) are used to reach a wider audience and encourage discussion on the topic.
